title: Purchasing power determines value of dollar

content.question: The real value of the United States dollar is determined by

choices.label: the value of the gold backing the dollar
the goods and services it will buy

content.answer: the goods and services it will buy

topic.text: 4.3: Definition, Measurement, and Functions of Money

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe economic concepts, principles, or models.
